data.detailedDescription:
I spoke to my Sex Advisor this morning, and he told me I needed to get laid more often. Beating off into a silicone doll butthole while watching the porn tubes is great fun and all, but sometimes you need to stick your ding-ding inside of something live, wet, and tight. I guess I could try my luck at the local fatties on Tinder again, but what if I’m looking for something a little more, uh, professional?

That’s where SexAdvisor.com comes in. It’s a killer domain that’s been kicking around for decades, but its current incarnation is pretty fucking new to the Internet. You know, given the timing, I get the feeling the folks who built it are just as fed up with social distancing as the rest of us. The whole point of the site is to help you find brothels, erotic massages, strip clubs, swinger clubs, and other live, interactive adult entertainment. So let’s see if it’s time to end my dry spell.

Have You Spoken to a Sex Advisor Lately?

How do I know it’s exhaustive? Because I recognize the places! They’ve got the strip clubs everybody expects, like the local Déjà vu and a handful of the grimier ones with a reputation for backroom fun, plus a nearby Asian massage parlor I’ve heard some rumors about. A notable omission is a recently shuttered “Adult Bookstore” that had a gross little glory hole where chubby middle-aged women sucked off strangers. That joint had been operating openly for years, and a lot of folks around here have said it was just a matter of time.

By default, SexAdvisor.com is showing you all the local venues. However, if you’ve got some specific entertainment in mind, you can dial in one of the options at the top of the list. They’ve got categories for Brothels, Erotic Massages, Nightclubs, FKK, Swinger Club, and Escort Agencies.

I wasn’t familiar with the term FKK, but Sex Advisor has included a helpful little summary of the philosophy. FKK is an abbreviation for a German word, Freikörperkultur, which translates to “free body culture.” It’s very similar to nudism, involving hanging out and doing day-to-day while entirely naked.

I’ve actually got a couple of famous nudist resorts within a couple of hours of me, so I expected to see them show up on the list as soon as I switched to the FKK view. Unfortunately, it looks like all the FKK locations they’ve got listed are in different European countries. I have to assume it’s due to some subtleties about the definition of FKK that I’m just not familiar with yet, or perhaps American nudism just doesn’t jive with the FKK philosophy. It could also be a result of the algorithms that have helped build the site; maybe the resort owners need to enter the info themselves.

While I am slightly disappointed those nudist camps weren’t on the list, I found out something nice about SexAdvisor.com: the site has thousands of clubs, agencies, and brothels listed worldwide. That worldwide listing means the site isn’t landlocked like a lot of similar directories, and you can use it from anywhere in the world. This will only get better as the site continues to grow.

The concept of FKK isn’t well-known in the United States, so it was helpful for Sex Advisor to include the write-up explaining the basics. And it isn’t just the FKK section, either, but each of the categories on the site, from the Brothels to the Erotic Massages to the Swinger Clubs, includes some basic information that will be helpful to newbies of these types of services.

At the end of the day, though, it’s up to you to make sure you’ve done your homework to stay safe while getting your dick wet. SexAdvisor is arguably a part of that homework, and this next section will explain another way the site’s so helpful in helping you pay for sex.

Reviews from Your Fellow Escort Bangers

If you’ve spent much time here at MissAVDH, checking out my reviews of escort sites and directories, you probably already know how I feel about this feature. When I see a new escort site pop up without reviews, my first reaction is always, “What the fuck?” I don’t even buy penis growth cream without reading the reviews anymore, not after that nasty chemical burn incident. So why would you hit up a brothel you haven’t heard shit about? It could be a honey trap or just a wretched hive of scum and villainy.

The default view at SexAdvisor.com sorts the locations by proximity to you, but there are other ways to reshuffle the stack. For example, if you’re in a bigger city with plenty of options, you may be better off sorting the clubs by Popularity, Top Rated, or Discussed. This is a feature that is only going to improve as the site continues to mature.

The one downside to the review setup is that there aren’t many reviews yet as a very new site. Maybe that’s my cue to sign up for an account and start posting comments. Registration is free, but not required. I know a lot of you worry about leaving any kind of digital paper trail, but you don’t need to sign up for anything just to use the site if you ain’t going to leave reviews. Everything is visible without a membership, including all the contact info you’re going to need.

And it’s not just contact info, either; the brothel and club listings on SexAdvisor are surprisingly thorough, breaking down the hours, parking situation, and even prices. I really like the gallery photos, which will help you gauge the vibe when no reviews are available. You can tell a lot about a sex club by the lighting and the furniture, even though they usually take the shots when the joints are empty.

Like TripAdvisor, But Even More Useful

The entire presentation has a professional vibe, and you know what? With my adblocker running, I didn’t even see any spam. That’s a rarity on any free site, especially one without a clear monetization strategy. I’m not sure where SexAdvisor.com is making their money, but I sure ain’t complaining.

Really, my biggest complaint about the site is just that it’s so fucking new. That means many of those review sections are still empty, waiting for some John to let us know about his experience with this escort agency, that swinger club, or the FKK establishment down the block. But, of course, as the site grows, those empty spaces will start to fill in, and the whole thing will get even more useful.

SexAdvisor.com is one of the nicer directories of brothels, agencies, and adult clubs I’ve seen in a while. It’s completely free to use and instantly shows you what’s available in your area, so I recommend a look even if you’re not actively trying to buy some pussy tonight. Who knows? You may end up having a better evening than you were expecting.

TopEscortBabes! It ain’t super hard for a website to stretch itself across the whole world via the magic of the Internet, but this website has the traffic numbers to prove people are actually getting laid here. With a couple of million visits per month and more than 30,000 advertisers, you can be assured there’s a fine selection of poon for sale.

Get Laid Anywhere in the World

You can also select your location from a big world map. When you hover over a country, it will tell you how many hookers you’ll find in their listings. Right now, TopEscortBabes lists about 400 whores in Canada, more than 700 in Russia, and a couple thousand in France. Voulez-vous coucher avec moi ce soir?

I’ve been on a bit of a USA fuck tour lately, and I noticed Los Angeles is listed as one of the site’s top cities. I clicked my way to the city and holy fucking shit, I’m definitely getting laid tonight. There are close to 200 profiles and a dozen agencies, with over a thousand photos and a nice handful of videos.

One of the things I noticed immediately about Top Escort Babes is that the beautiful women are, for the most part, showing their faces as well as their bodies in their profile pictures. You get a lot escort sites where the girls have blurred out their mugs. This may be a little riskier for the girls, but I appreciate getting a look at the lips that will be wrapped around my cock later, especially if I’m shelling out a wad of Benjamins for the privilege.

You can even filter your search results down to just the professional video whores, which you’ll have to admit is a few steps up from the toothless crack whore who sucked your dick behind 7-11 last week.

Hovering over an escort thumbnail gives you a little blurb about the girl and even lists a price! Naturally, the girls who star in high-budget gangbang films cost a lot more to hump than your run-of-the-mill cum-dumpster. LA has a lot of girls selling their services starting at around four bills a throw, but how far your money goes will depend a lot on your location and what you’re after.

I noticed another escort with a less enticing badge: Suspicious Profile. If you’re new to the world of hooker listing sites, you might be wondering why the fuck they don’t just delete suspicious profiles. Like it or not, the world’s oldest profession has always been a ripe breeding ground for scams, and most sites just leave you to fend for yourself. TopEscortBabes is giving you fuckers a heads up because they know you won’t come back if you always end up with blue balls and an empty wallet. The Suspicious Profile badge sticks around until photo verification, which is just another way the site is looking after you.

If you scroll down your city listings far enough, you’ll start seeing girls with a badge that says “Last seen more than six months”. I’m kind of bummed I might not be able to smash this thick Latina I found, but I’m glad the side lets me know the listing is a bit stale. On the other hand, this chick’s mobile number is listed, so I might give her a call anyway. I also added her to my Favorites, letting me keep an eye on her every time I visit the site.

Window Shopping the Red Light District

Each profile lists basic details like age, eye color and sexual orientation, as well as the hours they’re available to meet up with you. Some girls do incalls, others outcalls, but most do both. You can also find out if they’re willing to meet with women or couples, so maybe you can bring that kinky little broad you’ve been seeing on the side.

One thing I didn’t like is that you don’t get an explicit list of available services like you do on some hooker websites. It’s kind of on you to work that out before you hop in your Uber.

Just like when you buy shit on Amazon, it’s better to buy an NSA hookup with a bunch of good reviews. The reviews are listed toward the top of each, though I really wish more of the chicks here have been written up by other users.

Searching Through the Aisles of Whores

The half-dozen available filters are useful, don’t get me wrong, but they fall short in a number of areas that I like to see on a good escort site. In fact, the filters are all directly related to the listings themselves and not really the girls. There’s no way to limit your selection to only blonde babes, young babes, or skinny babes. I like to check off a bunch of boxes telling a website what I’m looking for in an escort in terms of her body and kinkiness, but that’s currently not available at TopEscortBabes.

The good news is that they’re currently working on adding more filters. Apparently, there are more than 20 new ones coming down the pipeline, so I can’t wait to see how much they improve the site. They may be getting close to perfect if they can work this out.

TopEscortBabes.com has a sleek and professional design that really speaks to the quality of the site. I browsed it on my laptop, but I also took a look on my phone and the mobile version is one of the best I’ve seen in this category. You can tell they spent a lot of money making the site look pretty, and at least as much money making it work really well.

Well, my Uber will be here in a few minutes. I’ve got a date with this sexy young brunette I found on the site just a few minutes ago. It doesn’t cost a cent to browse and doesn’t make you sign up, so you haven’t got anything to lose by taking a look. Just make sure you have a few extra bucks to spend, because there are a fucking ton of listings, and some of them are guaranteed to get you itching for a quick and easy bang.

The Design of the Site

data.detailedDescription:
Despite the name, Bunny Agent isn’t a website for finding the high-end pet rabbit of your dreams. The implications would be weird as hell if I wrote about a platform like that here at MissAVDH, because my whole thing is pointing you guys toward things that’ll help you get your rocks off. To that end, this next joint deals not with furry little mammals, but with human women who are a whole hell of a lot more fuckable. If you’re looking for a cute and cuddly domestic Leporidae, you could always try Petco, or better yet, a psychologist who’s trained in these things.

BunnyAgent.com is, in fact, a global escort directory with listings around the world. The domain’s been around since 2023, but their traffic has really been exploding recently to the tune of hundreds of thousands of monthly visitors. That’s always a good sign for any type of website, but a platform like this absolutely thrives on its userbase. With any luck, those traffic stats would translate to a big-ass selection of women, which should make for a really fucking good time tonight. Who’s with me?

Is She the Bunny Agent?

Bunny Agent not only has a better name, but man, I really like their logo, too. It’s got this mysterious erotic vibe that’s heightened by the babe who greets you at the top of the front page. Looking like something straight out of Kubrick’s Eyes Wide Shut, she stands before a golden curtain wearing black lingerie, a gilded bunny mask, and an inviting look on her face.

Could she be the titular Bunny Agent? I might be a little biased as MissAVDH, operator of MissAVDH and MissAVDHCasting amongst other MissAVDH-branded websites, but a fun character can do wonders for your brand recognition. Perhaps more important for a site like this, though, are the digits listed beside our sexy, masked hostess.

As of this writing, BunnyAgent.com lists nearly 120,000 escorts around the world. As with similar websites, there’s a breakdown of locations out on the front page, right below the gal in the fapworthy rabbit getup. Click a country or continent and it unfolds, offering up states or regions that unfold further into cities. It looks like they’ve got the best coverage in the US and Canada, but I was impressed by just how many cities are represented around the world.

I took a few quick dives into Bunny Agent’s selection of cities, just to get an overview of what’s available. I found 40 babes working out of San Francisco, to say nothing of the surrounding Bay Area. BunnyAgent lists 160 escorts in Vancouver, more than 500 in Brussels, and what the fuck is this? There are more than 7500 female escorts operating out of Dubai! You know, I hear the most contradictory rumors about that place…

Who’s Fucking Out in the Burbs?

Case in point, I’m in the Chicago ‘burbs today. Bunny Agent has over 120 escorts listed in the city itself, but I’ve got to browse the surrounding cities separately. Naperville’s got 18 call girls, Buffalo Grove’s got a couple and Evanston’s only got one, but I wish they were all on the same list.

The setup might slow you down a little, but it shouldn’t stop you; I assume you know the names of all your neighboring towns, right? In either case, escorts aren’t the only thing listed at Bunny Agent. They’ve also got strip club and massage parlor listings, broken up by city like the gals are.

BunnyAgent only lists 4 strip clubs in Chicago, which I know ain’t quite accurate, but it looks like the posts are made by the clubs themselves. Likewise with the 90 erotic massage parlors in the city. As BunnyAgent.com grows, I imagine they’ll have more entrepreneurs and business owners flocking in. The listings are really fucking useful, too, breaking down what all is available and even including some prices. It looks like lap dances are just forty bones a pop at Rick’s Cabaret, and I’d love to get one from the models they have in their promo shot.

Verified Chicks and XXX Pics

Unfortunately, there doesn’t seem to be a way to browse only the Verified chicks. The whole site is lacking in filters, so you can’t dial in your favorite body type, hair color, price range, verification status or really anything else. You’ll just have to browse each listing individually.

Escorts can post explicit listings, so I saw a fair number of nudes and even some sex pics as I was perusing the selection. I did feel like I saw fewer specific sex acts listed here than I do on other sites, which can potentially make it harder to find someone willing to do that kinky-ass thing you’re into. They do list prices, though, for both incall and outcall.

Most of the little blurbs didn’t seem like the typical self-promotion pseudo-bios I usually see on these sites, though. They look like AI to me, all vague and similar. As a guy who does words on the internet, I’ve got my own issues with robot writing, but the biggest problem is that it might not be accurate. When in doubt, make sure to ask your potential hookup before hooking up.

They do make that part easy, since you don’t have to register an account to see contact info. Phone numbers are plainly listed near the top of any listing, though I’m a little disappointed they don’t offer alternate contact details, like WhatsApp or Telegram. Those can be preferable for obvious paper-trail reasons.

I found a sexy Latina name Luna with a thick ass doing hour-long sessions for $250, and her semi-nude photos got me all hot and bothered. Her blurb reads as generic as most of the BunnyAgent listings, but her phone number is plainly listed, so I can just ask what exactly she’s down to do tonight.

You know what I’d really love to see on Luna’s profile even more than a list of fetishes and services? I wish more than anything that the platform included customer reviews, which would go a long way in putting me at ease with this evening’s decision. More and more modern escort sites have rolled in the feature, making sites like this feel like they’re behind the times. I don’t like to spend twenty bucks on a phone charger without looking at the reviews, but you want me to drop a couple hundo based on the seller’s word? Well, I guess if I have to…

BunnyAgent.com could use some tweaks, like more filters and a user-review feature, but it’s hard to argue against their extensive spread of escorts, strip clubs and massage parlors around the world. The sheer volume of listings everywhere is easily the site’s strongest asset, because you can pull up a great selection in most major metropolitan areas. I’ve been getting excited about the possibilities ever since I started whipping up this review, and you know what? It’s time to act on that excitement.

data.title: Anna Claire
data.description: AnnaClaire.net is a luxury escort service for discerning gentlemen who enjoy high-end international travel companions and elite dating
data.detailedDescription:
If you’ve never heard the name Anna Claire, well, maybe you’re not as high class as you’ve been pretending to your friends. All kidding aside, the company has built a reputation over the last decade and a half with affluent dudes, sophisticated gentlemen and globe-trotting professionals. You don’t necessarily have to fall into one of the above categories to make use of their services, but it certainly helps. As we’ll see in a second here, they’re offering a truly elite level of service that frankly ain’t affordable to the average joe, but you know what they say: you get what you pay for.

AnnaClaire.net is a high-end luxury escort service, catering to a clientele who demand the best of all worlds, and they’re operating all around the world. The website gets an easy hundred thousand visitors a month, but I’d bet a fair share of those digits are just curious window shoppers. This is an exclusive club, but if you can get inside, you’ll never have to settle for anything less than the girl of your dreams. If I’ve piqued your interest, read on and I’ll tell you more about their international operation.

An Entirely Different Type of Escort Site

It feels so fancy that the similarities between the low-class dives almost seem ironic, but that could be said about all kinds of industries. As with the cheaper platforms for cheaper consumers, Anna Claire has models around the world, with a sidebar menu of locales like USA, the Middle East, South America and South Africa. Tap a region and it unfolds with some more specific spots. One of the big differences here is that you can book a legit travel companion to accompany you on your globe-spanning travels, or even fly a gal out to wherever you’re currently kicking it.

They also offer stress-free experiences, with a concierge service that handles all the details so you don’t have to worry about things like plane tickets, hotel rooms, nightlife and events. Get yourself a personally designed GFE package that doesn’t require hours of setup and headaches on your end. This is a rarity in the business, another major perk for the high rollers who can afford the best things in life. Is that you, or are you just daydreaming again?

Elite Escorts for Elite Clientele

Anna Claire has insanely tight quality control that goes well above and beyond the vague “model verification” they offer on other sites. After a thorough security check, these gals are coached in every element of the agency’s services. These chicks all speak English and perhaps some other tongues, and they speak well, so you won’t have a date embarrassing you with boring conversation or sketchy vernacular. They understand grooming and etiquette, they’re smart and sophisticated, and they don’t make the cut unless their personalities are warm, passionate and engaging.

It's worth mentioning that AnnaClaire doesn’t offer quickies, last-minute engagements, incalls or cut-rate bargain dates. If you’re looking for any of that, you’ll have to lower your standards a bit and hire a call girl from one of the lesser sites. Two hours is the minimum here, and you’ll have to book ahead of time, especially if you’re looking for an international experience. Honestly, I was a little surprised they only require a 50% downpayment, which helps cover travel expenses.

The prices and the wait times are worth it, though. Instead of skeezing around with some backwoods cokehead chick who didn’t finish high school, you can go on fancy dinner dates, attend exclusive shows and spend the weekend at five-star resorts with upper-class travel companions who are just your speed. Anna Claire’s models can even accompany you to social events and nobody would guess you paid for the lovely lady on your arm. Well, not unless they know you really well, you rascal.

Easy and Discreet International Booking

I’m currently on the West Coast, staring at the beautiful Pacific Ocean as I type this up, so I decided to peruse the beautiful AnnaClaire models in San Francisco. You don’t necessarily have to stay local with these guys, though it has some obvious advantages that I shouldn’t have to spell out. As I type this up, there are five Bay Area babes, though my friends in Europe will find a bigger range of potential companions to peruse.

A dark-haired Mediterranean model named Karina caught my eye, so I took a closer look at her profile. There’s a nice little photo gallery to help get the juices flowing and kick my brain into overdrive, and they would all feel at home in a fashion magazine. “Karina is one of those rare women with a striking outward appearance and a wholehearted appreciation for life,” reads the mini bio, going on about her health, body, personality and elegance, not to mention her perfect tan and proportions.

The listings here are not explicit, which keeps with the whole high-class theme and presentation of Anna Claire as a whole. There’s no menu of filthy sex acts just like there are no topless shots or skittle-diddling videos to tease you with. This just ain’t that kind of establishment, as you’ve no doubt figured out by now. They do, however, list meeting prices clearly. Karina’s not meeting up with low ballers, but you can see her for a couple hours if you’ve got $2500. Overnights are seven grand, and she does 24-hour international meetings starting at just eight, travel costs not included.

Aside from the non-explicit listings, the only other minor bummer is that there are no customer reviews. These have become one of my make-or-break features I look for on the other platforms, but with the high-end clientele these guys cater to, I’m not the least bit surprised they’re not doing customer writeups here. Anyway, given the elite high standards for their models, it’s much less of an issue than if you’re hiring some independent chick from a platform that lets any rando post a classified ad.

Another element of the high level of discretion here is that you don’t need to register an account to book a meeting. You can hit up an email address if that’s what you prefer, but the easier, faster option is just to call one of their Whatsapp numbers. They’ve got separate digits for Europe and US, London and Dubai, and one for customers in Asia, too. You don’t have to leave a paper trail, so why would you? This is all between you, Anna Claire, and your companion.

It’s goes without saying that AnnaClaire.net is not going to be the right escort service for everyone. In fact, it’s not going to be the right service for most. For the discriminating and distinguished gentleman with the means to afford it, though, they offer some of the best models and the best experiences you’ll find in this business anywhere in the entire world. With escorts spanning the entire globe, I mean that in more ways than one. If you’re among the world’s elite, why settle for less than that in a date?
